remarks: The cardinality of a disjoint union, not necessarily finite. cf. ~ hashuni .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Nov-2016.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Jan-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Jun-2017.)
statement:
hasheuni $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ Disj_ x e. A x ) -> ( # ` U. A ) = sum* x e. A ( # ` x ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
